scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a man, likely a king or noble, kneeling in prayer before an open book on a lectern. He wears a blue tunic, a pink cloak, and a fur-lined collar, suggesting high status. Above him, in a celestial realm depicted with a starry blue sky, Christ is shown with his hand raised in blessing, radiating golden light. The architectural setting includes an arcade with arches and columns, suggesting a grand interior space, possibly a palace or a church. Beyond this, through an archway, a landscape with buildings and a body of water is visible, hinting at an exterior view.
